body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Zachary Allen and the customer's name is Denise Nelson.  The conversation is about Phat Hogs (a Motorcycle Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Zachary Allen, and I'm here with Phat Hogs Motorcycle Dealership. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, Zachary. I'm Denise Nelson, and I need some help with finding the right motorcycle for me.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's great to meet you, Denise! I'd be happy to help. What type of motorcycle are you interested in?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm looking for something that is good for long trips but also manageable for daily rides.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: That sounds like a touring bike would suit your needs well. Before we dive deeper, can I get your age, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Denise! One more thing, could you provide me with your zip code?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's one zero one zero one.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect! This will help us find the best options available in your area. Have you ever ridden a motorcycle before?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, I have, but it's been a while. I'm a bit nervous about getting back into it.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: That's completely normal, Denise! We'll make sure you feel comfortable and confident with the right bike. Thank you for your time today! If you have any more questions, feel free to reach out.
